verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-ADV: apparently] [V: spent] [ARG1: the night] [ARG2: binge - watching Fox News ' coverage of the special counsel probe all the way to Wednesday morning] — and then lashed out angrily on Twitter .
